Blog.post: urlLink OMG...why is good charlotte bullying avril?.. poor avril... so cruel to girls >_____

okay man...u should've asked first before then actually think that i made myself 13 and i m sheep just tryin to impress steven..i mean wtf?-_-" geez!!!:@ i had to put i m 13 cuz thats the only way i can get a account if i m under 13 then i m not allowed for goodness sake next time try to ask b4 u make a statement-_-":@ oh and i m sorry that i forgot to put ur name about my friends part...sorry:|:@ screw u!!!!idiot!!! i think they are on the airplane but oh well...

u cant believe how happy i m!!!2morrow is the day i m goin bac to TAIWAN. oh yeah my friend steven is leaving canada he will be bac when he's grade ten."i'll look forward when u come bac :D"...everyone will~ we'll miss ur humour in class:P well good luck man!!! my other friend patty guess wut she is leaving too:'( so many ppl leaving she is sooo nice and usually gets second place at mandarin skool. she very smart and athletic. i hope u will come bac!!! mandarin skool wont be the same without these two ppl i'll miss u guys sooooo much!!! i cant really express it but i would hug u guys if i can:'( wish u guys to have a good life there:|

Basically tomorrow is my last day of skool, kant believe i m goin to be a grade seven'er...so fast. Anywayz i wanna wish every1 to have a great summer!!, for thos who are not gonna be here next year >

urlLink Thats taipei 101~ lovely isnt it~ there's one hundred and one floors can u believe it? It's high but there's only 4 floors for shoppin-___-" urlLink

urlLink ~The great thing about taiwan is that there's...BIG BIG shoppin mall, not just big but BIG!!! ~i m in taipei right now and there is so much malls that u can go to~ ~u probably have to spend 2 weeks there to finish shopping~ ~And of course there's the taiwanese favourites *nite market*, its full of treasure, entertainment,jewlries, food, and...omg Make up^^~ ~Chels u may hate asia but u can not resist the fun, plz visit taiwan i dunt care if u visit now or when ur 20 or when u are 50 or when u are 100 just visit taiwan for once "-_______-"*sigh* same to the people who hate asia. urlLink
